human-pose.title: Human pose estimation
human-pose.content: Human Pose Estimation is an important task in Computer Vision which has gained a lot of attention the last years and has a wide range of applications like human-computer interaction, gaming, action recognition, computer-assisted living, special effects.

hand-write-ocr.title: Hand write OCR
hand-write-ocr.content: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) is a technology that has achieved cult status when it comes to digitizing printed documents. In this demonstration, what ever you write will instantly translate to digital characters.

image.title: Upload Image
image.content: Click to select image file or drop image to upload.
